net.dean.jraw.http

Interface HttpClient<U extends RestResponse>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - The type of response returned by the RestClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractManager, AccountManager, InboxManager, MultiRedditManager, RedditClient, RedditOAuth2Client, RestClient, WikiManager

    public interface HttpClient<U extends RestResponse>
    This interface provides a way to mark classes that can make HTTP requests

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      U execute(RestRequest r)
      Executes an HTTP request
      U executeWithBasicAuth(RestRequest request, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Executes an HTTP request with basic authentication.
      RestRequest.Builder request()
      Creates a new builder object that can be used to model HTTP requests

    • Method Detail

      • request

        RestRequest.Builder request()
        Creates a new builder object that can be used to model HTTP requests
        Returns:
        A new RestRequest.Builder

      • execute

        U execute(RestRequest r)
                               throws NetworkException
        Executes an HTTP request
        Parameters:
        r - The request to execute
        Returns:
        A RestResponse from the resulting request
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful

      • executeWithBasicAuth

        U executeWithBasicAuth(RestRequest request,
                     java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
                                            throws NetworkException
        Executes an HTTP request with basic authentication. See RFC 2617 for more information.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to send
        username - The username to use. Will be encoded into base 64
        password - The password to use. Will be encoded into base 64
        Returns:
        A RestResponse from the resulting request
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful
